name: Junktown Boltdown
description:
Controls

Move - WASD

Aim  -  Right Mouse

Shoot -  Left Mouse

Jump - Spacebar

Jet  - Hold Spacebar

Dash - Left Shift

Junktown Boltdown is a high-octane 3rd person bullet hell set in a dystopian future. The player takes the role of the robot Bolt, who must fight to defend his town against the constantly evolving Lord Junkington, Bringer of the Apocalypse. Buckle up for a fast-paced aerial combat experience and kinetic gun battles through the streets of Junktown.

Made in collaboration with HardlyWorking.Inc
